name: roll the civilization
description:
The core object is a combination of cubes. These cubes all grow from a roll. The numberof cube is equal to the number of faces of the roll.

The goal of the game is simple -- Stack as highas possible.Just like our civilization. Our civilization also is made up of the randomand connected rolls.

Create a new object byright-clicking on a side ofthe blue object. Only the new blue cubescan be used as the base forthe next creation.

but！but！but！honestly，the part of gameplay can’t did not achieve the desired result，so it‘s like some simple children's building blocks.

In this gamejam, I was mainly responsible for designing gameplay and writing programs, while my partner was responsible for visual art. Thanks her.

【need encouragement】

核心物体是一个方块组。方块们都从一个骰子中生长出来。方块在各个方向上的数量，等于骰子相应的面的点数。

游戏的目标很简单，尽可能堆得高。就像我们的文明一样。我们的文明实际上也是由随机且关联的骰子们组成的啊。

使用鼠标右键点击蓝色物体的某个面，即可生成新的物体。只有刚刚创建的蓝色方块才能作为下一次创建的基底。

但是！但是！但是！不得不说，游戏的核心玩法部分，因为我对物理系统的不熟悉，几乎没有可玩性，现在的它的样子就像那种简单的儿童积木一样

这次的gamejam里，我主要负责设计玩法和写程序，我的伙伴负责视觉美术部分。谢谢yixuan
